sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: a powerful speech
sentences.chinese: 有感染力的演讲

detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

sentences.english: She prefers her coffee black.
sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: to like someone or something more than someone or something else, so that you would choose it if you could

sentences.english: The prosecution wanted more time to prepare their case.
sentences.chinese: 原告想要有更多的时间来准备诉讼。

detailed_translations.english: to make plans or arrangements for something that will happen in the future

sentences.english: Your presence is requested at the club meeting on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 敬请出席于周五举行的俱乐部会议。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is present in a particular place

name: present
trans: a.目前的；出席的；礼物，赠品n.现在vt.赠送；呈现

sentences.english: She was presented with an award .
sentences.chinese: 她被授予一个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone, for example at a formal or official occasion

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

sentences.english: The rules are intended to prevent accidents.
sentences.chinese: 这些规定旨在预防事故。

sentences.english: We were prevented from entering the site.
sentences.chinese: 我们被阻止进入现场。

sentences.english: Wrap small ornaments in paper to prevent them being damaged.
sentences.chinese: 把小饰品用纸包上以免损坏。

detailed_translations.english: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something

sentences.english: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about

sentences.english: Prince William
sentences.chinese: 威廉王子

sentences.english: Prince Rainier of Monaco
sentences.chinese: 摩纳哥的兰尼埃亲王

detailed_translations.english: the son of a king, queen, or prince

sentences.english: Princess Anne
sentences.chinese: 安妮公主

sentences.english: the Princess of Wales
sentences.chinese: 威尔士王妃

detailed_translations.english: a close female relation of a king and queen, especially a daughter

sentences.english: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.chinese: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.english: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.chinese: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.english: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.chinese: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

detailed_translations.english: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave

sentences.english: Over five million copies of the paper are printed every day.
sentences.chinese: 这份报纸每日印量超过五百万。

sentences.english: When the book was first written no publisher would print it.
sentences.chinese: 这本书刚写成时没有出版商愿意出版。

sentences.english: There was no print at all on the backs of the tickets.
sentences.chinese: 门票背面没有印任何文字。

detailed_translations.english: to produce many printed copies of a book, newspaper etc
writing that has been printed, for example in books or newspapers

sentences.english: He visits his dad in prison every week.
sentences.chinese: 他每周都去探望狱中的父亲。

sentences.english: Ricky has been out of prison for three years now.
sentences.chinese: 里基现已出狱三年。

sentences.english: They’ll probably put him in prison for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 他们很可能会让他在监狱里待很长时间。

sentences.english: Helen was sent to prison for attacking a man with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 海伦因持刀袭击一名男子而被送入监狱。

sentences.english: The two men were arrested only a week after they were released from prison .
sentences.chinese: 那两名男子从监狱获释后仅仅一周就被捕了。

sentences.english: Three terrorists escaped from Brixton Prison .
sentences.chinese: 有三名恐怖分子从布里克斯顿监狱越狱了。

sentences.english: an increase in the number of women going to prison
sentences.chinese: 入狱女性人数的增多

sentences.english: Mr Gunn received a ten year prison sentence .
sentences.chinese: 冈恩先生获刑十年。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people are kept as a punishment for a crime, or while they are waiting to go to court for their  trial

sentences.english: He was being held prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他正遭囚禁。

sentences.english: Our pilot was taken prisoner .
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员被抓起来了。

sentences.english: The army advanced, taking 200,000 prisoners .
sentences.chinese: 军队向前推进，抓获20万名俘虏。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is taken by force and kept somewhere

name: private
trans: 私下的；秘密的，不公开的

sentences.english: Morris has a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.english: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.chinese: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

detailed_translations.english: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

sentences.english: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.chinese: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.english: a drop in oil and gas production
sentences.chinese: 石油和天然气产量的下降

detailed_translations.english: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities

sentences.english: What professional qualifications does he have?
sentences.chinese: 他有哪些专业资格？

sentences.english: You may need to seek professional help.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要寻求专业帮助。

sentences.english: the terms that doctors and other health professionals use
sentences.chinese: 医师和其他保健专业人员使用的术语

detailed_translations.english: relating to a job that needs special education and training
someone who works in a job that needs special education and training, such as a doctor, lawyer, or architect

sentences.english: The professor improvised a poem in the class.
sentences.chinese: 教授在课堂上即兴创作了一首诗。

sentences.english: The professor lambasted me for my careless mistake.
sentences.chinese: 教授严厉批评了我的粗心错误。

sentences.english: We were laughing about that absent-minded professor.
sentences.chinese: 我们都在笑那个心不在焉的教授。

sentences.english: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.english: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.chinese: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.english: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.chinese: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

detailed_translations.english: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to get money from doing something

sentences.english: Any large high-speed computer can be programmed to learn.
sentences.chinese: 任何大型高速计算机都可以通过编程获得学习能力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a computer a set of instructions that it can use to perform a particular operation

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage

name: project
trans: n.计划；工程；项目vi.伸出 vt.设计，规划

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

sentences.english: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你许下一个诺言，你就应该遵守它。

sentences.english: Last night the headmaster promised a full investigation.
sentences.chinese: 校长昨晚允诺进行全面调查。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will definitely happen
to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

sentences.english: It is right and proper that parents take responsibility for their children's attendance at school.
sentences.chinese: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.english: He is always perfectly proper in his behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为举止向来是无可挑剔的。

detailed_translations.english: socially and morally acceptable

sentences.english: The hotel is not responsible for any loss or damage to guests’ personal property .
sentences.chinese: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.english: Some of the stolen property was found in Mason’s house.
sentences.chinese: 在梅森家里找到了部分被盗财物。

detailed_translations.english: the thing or things that someone owns

sentences.english: The president is to put forward new proposals for resolving the country's constitutional crisis.
sentences.chinese: 总统将提出解决国家宪法危机的新议案。

sentences.english: She politely declined his proposal of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她礼貌地拒绝了他的求婚。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion which is made formally to an official person or group, or the act of making it

sentences.english: the changes currently proposed by the local planning authorities
sentences.chinese: 目前由地方规划局提议的改革

sentences.english: the proposed budget cuts
sentences.chinese: 所提出的预算削减

detailed_translations.english: to suggest something as a plan or course of action

sentences.english: The prospect of marriage terrified Alice.
sentences.chinese: 想到要结婚，艾丽斯害怕极了。

sentences.english: I had no job, no education, and no prospects .
sentences.chinese: 我没有工作，没受过什么教育，前途渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: a particular event which will probably or definitely happen in the future – used especially when you want to talk about how you feel about it

sentences.english: the protection of the environment
sentences.chinese: 环境保护

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is protected

sentences.english: The first edition was published in 1765.
sentences.chinese: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.english: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.chinese: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.english: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.english: The latest unemployment figures will be published tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

sentences.english: The purpose of this meeting is to elect a new chairman.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

detailed_translations.english: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

sentences.english: We’ll have to be quiet so as not to wake the baby.
sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.english: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.english: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.english: It was a Sunday, about three o’clock, and the streets were quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

detailed_translations.english: not making much noise, or making no noise at all

sentences.english: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.english: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.chinese: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

sentences.english: They quoted a price of £15,000.
sentences.chinese: 他们报价1.5万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written

name: radical
trans: a.基本的;激进的n.激进分子

sentences.english: They are proposing radical changes to the way the company is run.
sentences.chinese: 他们建议对公司经营模式进行重大改革。

sentences.english: a radical reform of the tax system
sentences.chinese: 税收制度的彻底改革

sentences.english: There are radical differences between the two organizations.
sentences.chinese: 这两个组织有着根本差异。

detailed_translations.chinese: 根本的，基本的；激进的，激进派的
detailed_translations.english: a radical change or difference is very big and important
someone who has new and different ideas, especially someone who wants complete social and political change

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

sentences.english: The patient made a rapid recovery.
sentences.chinese: 病人迅速康复。

sentences.english: a period of rapid decline
sentences.chinese: 迅速衰退期

sentences.english: He fired three times in rapid succession (= one after another ) .
sentences.chinese: 他接连开了三枪。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done very quickly and in a very short time

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

sentences.english: The book will appeal to young readers.
sentences.chinese: 这本书会吸引年轻读者。

sentences.english: I’ve always been an avid reader (= someone who reads a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 我向来是一个嗜书如命的人。

sentences.english: a series of graded English readers
sentences.chinese: 一系列分级英语读物

detailed_translations.english: someone who reads books, or who reads in a particular way

name: ready
trans: a.准备好的；愿意的；就要...的

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

sentences.english: He's always ready to help his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐意帮助朋友。

detailed_translations.english: fully prepared for what you are going to do

sentences.english: the distinction between fantasy and reality
sentences.chinese: 幻想和现实之间的区别

sentences.english: TV is used as an escape from reality .
sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府已经脱离了现实。

sentences.english: political realities
sentences.chinese: 政治现实

sentences.english: The paperless office may one day become a reality .
sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

sentences.english: It took us a while to realize the extent of the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 我们过了一段时间才意识到这场悲剧有多严重。

sentences.english: It was only later that I realized my mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我到后来才认识到自己的错误。

sentences.english: She never realized her ambition of winning an Olympic gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句:她一直未能实现赢取奥运会金牌的抱负。

detailed_translations.english: to know and understand something, or suddenly begin to understand it

sentences.english: Voters rebelled against high property taxes.
sentences.chinese: 投票者们反对高额财产税。

detailed_translations.english: to oppose or fight against someone in authority or against an idea or situation which you do not agree with
someone who opposes or fights against people in authority

sentences.english: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.english: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

sentences.english: Cole was recalled to the squad to replace the injured Quinn.
sentences.chinese: 科尔被召回队里代替受伤的奎因。

sentences.english: The cars had to be recalled due to an engine fault.
sentences.chinese: 由于发动机缺陷，那些汽车必须召回。

detailed_translations.english: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

sentences.english: He has recently been promoted to Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 他最近晋升为经理助理。

sentences.english: a recently published biography
sentences.chinese: 一部最近出版的传记

sentences.english: Jerry lived in Cairo until quite recently .
sentences.chinese: 直至不久之前杰里一直住在开罗。

sentences.english: More recently, he’s appeared in a number of British films.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他出演了多部英国电影。

detailed_translations.english: not long ago

sentences.english: the economic recession of the early 1980s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.english: There is deep recession in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 英国处于严重的经济衰退之中。

detailed_translations.english: a difficult time when there is less trade, business activity etc in a country than usual

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

sentences.english: a long, straight road
sentences.chinese: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.chinese: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.english: Always lift with a straight back.

sentences.english: her long, straight black hair
sentences.chinese: 她又长又直的黑发

sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

sentences.english: The road was dead straight (= completely straight ) .
sentences.chinese: 那条路是笔直的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的
detailed_translations.english: something that is straight does not bend or curve

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地
detailed_translations.english: in a level or correct position

detailed_translations.chinese: 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者
detailed_translations.english: the straight part of a  racetrack

sentences.english: a strange city
sentences.chinese: 陌生的城市

sentences.english: strange noises
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的噪声

sentences.english: Does Geoff’s behaviour seem strange to you?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得杰夫的行为反常吗？

sentences.chinese: 她觉得德克斯特的声音有点奇怪。

sentences.chinese: 动物似乎能感觉到危险，这不是很奇怪吗？

sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，我们以前居然从来没有碰见过。

sentences.english: For some strange reason, I slept like a baby despite the noise.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，不知为什么，尽管很吵闹，但我仍睡得很香。

sentences.english: Strange as it may seem, I actually prefer cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 听上去也许很奇怪，我竟然喜欢冷天。

sentences.english: That’s strange. I was sure Jude was right here a second ago.
sentences.chinese: 真奇怪，我肯定祖德刚刚还在这儿的。

sentences.english: The strange thing is all four victims had red hair.
sentences.chinese: 令人奇怪的是，四名受害者都是红头发的。

detailed_translations.english: not familiar because you have not been there before or met the person before

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

detailed_translations.english: a planned series of actions for achieving something

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

name: struggle
trans: n.斗争；奋斗 vi.斗争；奋斗

sentences.english: They had to struggle against all kinds of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不同各种困境斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to try extremely hard to achieve something, even though it is very difficult

sentences.english: a recording studio in Nashville
sentences.chinese: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.english: a photographer’s studio
sentences.chinese: 摄影师的工作室

detailed_translations.english: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

sentences.english: an attempt to use Japanese management style in a European business
sentences.chinese: 将日本的管理方式用于欧洲企业的尝试

detailed_translations.english: a particular way of doing, designing, or producing something, especially one that is typical of a particular place, period of time, or group of people
to design clothing, furniture, or the shape of someone’s hair in a particular way

name: subject
trans: a.受支配 n.题目;学科;主语

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: succeed
trans: vt.继…之后 vi.成功；继任；接着发生

sentences.english: She wanted to be the first woman to climb Mount Qomolangma, and she almost succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you tried or wanted to do
to be the next person to take a position or job after someone else

sentences.english: The experiment was a big success.
sentences.chinese: 实验非常成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: when you achieve what you want or intend

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

sentences.english: I suddenly realized that there was someone following me.
sentences.chinese: 我突然意识到有人跟着我。

sentences.english: George died very suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 乔治死得非常突然。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the eagle opened its wings.
sentences.chinese: 突然，鹰展开翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: quickly and unexpectedly

sentences.english: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

detailed_translations.english: to experience physical or mental pain

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled
to be acceptable, suitable, or  convenient  for a particular person or in a particular situation

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

sentences.english: the European summit
sentences.chinese: 欧洲首脑会议

sentences.chinese: 两位总统商定在春天举行一次首脑会议。

sentences.english: a five-nation summit meeting
sentences.chinese: 五国峰会

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高点， 峰顶； 最高级会议

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves

sentences.chinese: 你星期天做什么？

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.chinese: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

sentences.chinese: 地球表面将近 10% 被冰层覆盖。

sentences.chinese: 在任何液体中气泡往往都会浮到表面。

sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.chinese: 地质勘察

sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.chinese: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

sentences.english: She’s not going to be very happy about this, I suspect .
sentences.chinese: 我想对于此事她不会太高兴。

sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs

sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership

sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: a photo stuck to the wall with tape
sentences.chinese: 用胶布贴在墙上的照片

detailed_translations.chinese: 录音；用带子捆扎；用胶布把…封住
detailed_translations.english: to record sound or pictures onto a tape

sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time

sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.english: She has such good taste.
sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which you know one food from another

sentences.english: Would you like a cup of tea or coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你想来一杯茶还是咖啡？

sentences.english: Do you take milk and sugar in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你的茶里面要放牛奶和糖吗？

sentences.english: I’d like two teas and a piece of chocolate cake, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要两杯茶和一块巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

sentences.english: The children were all in tears .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们全都哭了。

sentences.english: She came home in floods of tears .
sentences.chinese: 她泪流满面地回到家里。

sentences.english: I could see that Sam was close to tears .
sentences.chinese: 我看到萨姆都快哭了。

sentences.english: Bridget suddenly burst into tears and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特突然大哭着跑了出去。

sentences.chinese: 他一边说，一边拼命忍住泪水。

sentences.english: A lot of people were moved to tears by his story.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都被他的故事感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He kissed her cheek, a gesture that brought tears to her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 他亲了亲她的脸，这个举动让她热泪盈眶。

sentences.english: I must admit I shed a few tears when the school closed.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，学校关闭时我掉过几滴眼泪。

sentences.english: I saw grown men reduced to tears that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天我看到成年男子都流下了眼泪。

sentences.english: ‘Please don’t talk like that,’ Ellen implored him, her eyes filling with tears .
sentences.chinese: “请别那么说。”埃伦恳求道，眼里噙满泪水。

sentences.english: By this time, tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 此时，我已泪流满面。

sentences.english: The tears he shed were tears of joy .
sentences.chinese: 他淌下的是喜悦的泪水。

sentences.english: In mathematics, we use many techniques of problem-solving.
sentences.chinese: 在数学中，我们会使用多种方法解题。

sentences.english: He’s a great player, with brilliant technique.
sentences.chinese: 他是个伟大的球员，球技十分精湛。

detailed_translations.english: a special way of doing something

sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

sentences.english: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

sentences.english: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚发表了他的第十本小说。

sentences.english: Not because she lost, in fact she just won her last election to her tenth term by a landslide.
sentences.chinese: 不只因为她的失败，事实上她只是由于占绝对优势的选举赢得第十期最后的选举。

sentences.chinese: 很多人已经选择第二个选择了：十分之一汇向非洲国家的汇款来自欧洲国家。

detailed_translations.english: one of ten equal parts of something
one of ten equal parts of something

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: Hong Kong is a Chinese territory.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中国的领土。

sentences.english: The company is moving into unfamiliar territory with this new software.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正通过这种新软件进入一个不熟悉的领域。

detailed_translations.english: land that is owned or controlled by a particular country, ruler, or military force

sentences.english: an open-air theatre (= a theatre that is outside )
sentences.chinese: 露天剧场

sentences.english: the Mercury Theater
sentences.chinese: 水星剧院

detailed_translations.english: a building or place with a stage where plays and shows are performed

sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.english: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.english: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

sentences.english: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?
sentences.chinese: 工间喝咖啡是成人的休息方式吗？

detailed_translations.english: a way of explaining or doing something that is typical of a particular group or period of time

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

sentences.english: Union leaders are heading for victory in their battle over workplace rights.
sentences.chinese: 工会领袖们在争取工作场所权利的斗争中正迈向胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you win a battle, game, election, or dispute

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

sentences.english: There is too much sex and violence on TV these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今电视上性爱和暴力场面太多。

detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is intended to hurt other people physically

sentences.english: He recognized her voice instantly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻听出了她的声音。

sentences.english: I could hear angry voices.
sentences.chinese: 我听到了愤怒的声音。

detailed_translations.english: the sounds that you make when you speak, or the ability to make these sounds
to tell people your opinions or feelings about a particular subject

sentences.english: Can you turn the volume up?
sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.english: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.english: The period from 1940 – 1945 is in volume 9.
sentences.chinese: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

sentences.english: Voters overwhelmingly rejected the Far Right in the May elections.
sentences.chinese: 在5月的选举中，选民普遍排斥极右政党。

sentences.english: In Ireland 83% of voters favoured EC membership in 1972.
sentences.chinese: 1972年，83%的爱尔兰选民赞成加入欧洲共同体。

sentences.english: Tory voters
sentences.chinese: 保守党选民

detailed_translations.chinese: 选举人，投票人；有投票权者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has the right to vote in a political election, or who votes in a particular election

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

sentences.english: ‘Be careful, the rocks are slippery,’ Alex warned.
sentences.chinese: “小心，岩石很滑。”亚历克斯提醒说。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something bad or dangerous may happen, so that they can avoid it or prevent it

sentences.english: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

sentences.english: The illness left her feeling weak.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她感到身体虚弱。

sentences.english: Poor light produces weak plants.
sentences.chinese: 光照不足，植物就生长不好。

sentences.english: The animal was weak from loss of blood.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物因失血而虚弱无力。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
detailed_translations.english: not physically strong

sentences.english: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

detailed_translations.english: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun

sentences.english: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.chinese: 你的袜子磨出了个洞。

detailed_translations.english: to become thinner or weaker after continuous use, or to make something do this

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.english: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Tuesday and Thursday

sentences.english: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.english: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.chinese: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.english: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.chinese: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会
detailed_translations.english: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
to spend the weekend somewhere

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

sentences.english: This afternoon we'll block act two.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我们将排演第二幕。

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

sentences.english: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.english: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.english: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

detailed_translations.english: during the time that something is happening
to spend time in a pleasant and lazy way

sentences.english: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.chinese: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.english: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.chinese: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。

name: wild
trans: a.野生的;野蛮的 n.荒地

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["wild animals"]}
sentences.chinese: 野生动物

sentences.english: a field full of wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 遍地野花的田野

sentences.english: animals both wild and domesticated
sentences.chinese: 野生动物和家养动物

detailed_translations.chinese: 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的
detailed_translations.english: living in a natural state, not changed or controlled by people
in natural and free conditions, not kept or controlled by people
if plants run wild, they grow a lot in an uncontrolled way

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: How much are they willing to pay?
sentences.chinese: 他们愿意付多少钱？

detailed_translations.english: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

sentences.english: a glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from grapes, or a type of this drink
to entertain someone well with a meal, wine etc

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.english: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把护照带着。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
detailed_translations.english: making you admire someone or something very much

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: Some of his most powerful writing is based on his childhood experiences.
sentences.chinese: 他的一些最震慑人心的作品是根据儿时经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: books, poems, articles etc, especially those by a particular writer or about a particular subject

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: a hundred yards away
sentences.chinese: 100码外

sentences.english: an area of 9,000 square yards
sentences.chinese: 面积为9,000平方码的一片区域

detailed_translations.chinese: 院子；码（英制中丈量长度单位，1码=3英尺）；庭院；帆桁
detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to three feet or 0.91 metres

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: Despite his youth, he had travelled alone.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然年纪还小，却已独自旅行过了。

sentences.english: The youth of today are the pensioners of tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天的年轻人就是明天领养老金的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being young

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past
